Description: Unifacial triangular scraper: of pale brown flint, chipped along all three edges. There is a strip of white crust on the upper surface.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Abydos' I (London, 1902), 8, pl.XV, group marked V.
Bibliographic references: Davies 1987 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities in the British Museum
